company_1.name: UUGift - Upgrade System
company_1.description: UUGift is an e-commerce website specializing in gift items tailored for Japan’s seasonal events and holidays. Includes several management subsystems: event management, data and logistics management, and an admin dashboard for website.
responsibility: Customize front-end templates to match design requirements.
Fix bugs and maintain legacy features on the existing EC-CUBE-based system.

company_1.name: Toyo Flyer
company_1.description: Toyo Flyer is a web-based system that enables businesses to create, manage, and distribute promotional flyers. The platform supports flyer content design, manages flyers on a per-business basis, and allows online publishing.
responsibility: Work with back-end developers to integrate APIs and handle data processing.
Optimize performance and usability on flyer creation, editing, and management pages.

company_1.name: SPRIX Compass School
company_1.description: SPRIX Compass School is an online learning management system for schools, supporting classroom, student, teacher, exam, and result management, as well as online testing.
responsibility: Develop and maintain user interfaces using NextJS.
Collaborate with back-end developers to integrate APIs and handle data processing.
Write unit tests for UI components and features using Jest.

company_1.name: EC-Photos
company_1.description: EC-Photos is a website implemented in photo stores across Japan, allowing customers to easily create and order personalized photo albums.
responsibility: Fix bugs and maintain existing features.

company_1.name: Creative Heads
company_1.description: Creative Heads is a football field management and rental project. The system includes: user site and admin dashboard.

company_1.name: Search Solution
company_1.description: Search Solution is a system for managing products, search content, and questions and answers related to Sciseed’s platform.

company_1.name: Sanyu - Kanbe
company_1.description: Sanyu is a student management system project for overseeing international students in Japan.
responsibility: Fix bugs and maintain existing features.

company_2.name: Enterprise Operating System
company_2.description: This is an internal enterprise management system designed for small and medium-sized companies, enabling the management of documents, human resources, tasks, leave, and more.
responsibility: Fix bugs and maintain existing features.

company_2.name: Dananggas
company_2.description: Dananggas is a corporate website introducing Anh Buu Company, which specializes in supplying and distributing gas products.

company_2.name: EEScons
company_2.description: EEScons is a corporate website introducing EEScons Company, a construction business.

company_2.name: DanavtcSurvey
company_2.description: DanavtcSurvey is the survey management system of Danang Vocational College.
